name: Geerbte Verantwortung
text: Gib dies dem Spieler von Peni Parker. Du darfst deine Identität auf deine Alter-Ego-Seite umdrehen. Wähle eines: •Erschöpfe Peni Parker → entferne Geerbte Verantwortung aus dem Spiel. •Wähle 1 [[Interface]]-Upgrade unter deiner Kontrolle und lege es ab. Lege diese Verpflichtung ab.

flavor: M.O.R.B.I.U.S. belagert die Stadt, verursacht Chaos und saugt die Energie aus dem Stromnetz ab.
name: Riesenmonster-Angriff
text: Als zusätzliche Kosten, um gegen diesen Plan Widerstand zu leisten, musst du eine [[energy]]-Ressource ausgeben.

flavor: "Dies ist eine Bedrohung, wie du sie noch nie erlebt hast!" — Onkel Ben
name: M.O.R.B.I.U.S.
text: Erzwungene Reaktion: Nachdem der Held im Kampf mit diesem Schergen eine beliebige Anzahl an Ressourcen erzeugt hat, füge dem Helden die gleiche Menge an Schaden zu. (SP//drs Erzfeind-Scherge.)

name: Energieverlust
text: Sobald aufgedeckt (Alter Ego): Wähle: Gib entweder [energy][energy]-Ressourcen aus oder erschöpfe deine Identität. Sobald aufgedeckt (Held) : Wähle: Gib entweder [energy][energy]-Ressourcen aus oder nimm 3 Schaden.

flavor: The Iron Spider's Sinister Six are on an crime spree, robbing every business they come across.
name: Grand Larceny
text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while a [[Criminal]] minion is in play.

name: Bombshell
text:
[star] Divide damage from Bombshell's attack among each character the attacked player controls as evenly as possible.
[star] Boost: Deal 1 indirect damage to each player. Exhaust each character damaged this way.

name: Electro
text: [star] Electro gets +1 hit point for each [energy] resource attached to her. [star] Forced Response: After Electro engages you or activates against you, choose 1 card from your hand with a printed [energy] resource and attach it to her.

name: Hobgoblin
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Hobgoblin would attack you, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck equal to Hobgoblin's ATK instead. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon ([boost]) discarded this way.

name: Iron Spider
text:
Guard. Patrol. Retaliate 1. Toughness.
[star] Iron Spider's attacks gain overkill.

name: Sandman
text:
Forced Response: After Sandman takes any amount of damage from an attack, discard the top 7 cards of the encounter deck.
[star] Boost: Discard the top 7 cards of the encounter deck.

name: Spot
text:
When Defeated: If Spot was defeated without excess damage, shuffle him into the encounter deck.
[star] Boost: Put this minion into play engaged with you.

name: Surge in Crime
text: Surge. Each [[Criminal]] minion gains surge. Hero Action: If there are no [[Criminal]] minions in play, spend 2 resources of any type → discard this card.
